definitions.definition: Curved like the inner surface of a sphere or bowl.
Not convex ; having at least one internal angle greater than 180 degrees.
definitions.label_groups: geometry , not comparable , of a polygon

definitions.definition: Satisfying the property that all segments connecting two points on the function's graph lie below the function.
labels: of a real-valued function on the reals
definitions.label_groups: functional analysis , not comparable , of a real-valued function on the reals

main_definition: Curved like the inner surface of a sphere or bowl.
secondary_definitions: ( geometry , not comparable , of a polygon ) Not convex ; having at least one internal angle greater than 180 degrees.
( functional analysis , not comparable , of a real-valued function on the reals ) Satisfying the property that all segments connecting two points on the function's graph lie below the function.
